page.title: 18Farming and the Trout Farm
page.content:
{Trout Farm} There is a small trout farm in Barby. They have two tanks of water from which you can select your fish. They also sell vegetables and Christmas trees.
{Farming} There has been quite a lot of oil-seed rape planted this year. This seems to be quite a new trend. The farm between Barby and Kilsby also owns land above Kilsby. The lady farmer is a particularly successful sheep farmer. The fields in the valley seem to be far bigger and lusher. this year has been a very wet year for the farmers. They are having problems drying the crops.
